Hi LES,

My organization (https://winterdragon.ca/ & https://geeksolutions.ca/) is launching general availability on DDoS Mitigation services, both On-Premise and SaaS. We've been in the DDoS Mitigation business for over 3 years, prior to this brand working for universities & colleges directly as an MSP providing DDoS Mitigation.

We've branched from our MSP roots and now do mitigation full time. So, without further ado, here's what we're offering!

**SaaS Pro**

* Fully automated setup
* SaaS Management Panel
* 1 TB of bandwidth included (clean)
* Up to 500Gbit/sec Layer 3/4 mitigation, up to 50M requests per second Layer 7 mitigation
* Unlimited Domains
* Protect both TCP-based Game Servers (eg, Minecraft), Web Applications
* Automatic on-demand Lets Encrypt SSL
* Real-time attack alerts with Graph Photographs (automated), including Mbps, Packets Per Second and Requests Per Second

*Pricing:* $50/mo for 50TB ($1/TB!)

*Purchase Link:* [https://billing.geeksolutions.ca/index.php/order/main/packages/pm1/?group_id=6](https://billing.geeksolutions.ca/index.php/order/main/packages/pm1/?group_id=6 "https://billing.geeksolutions.ca/index.php/order/main/packages/pm1/?group_id=6")

**How our mitigation works:**

1. Hunter: Our in-house detection system will detect incoming floods within 1 minute (average 3s time-to-detect)
2. Swooper: Our in-house mitigation systems swoops into action, applying rules in real-time to mitigate the incoming attacks, and adapt rules autonomously as the attack evolves
3. Killer: The attack is mitigated and your website or game server remains online

**FAQ**

**Free trial?**

Unfortunately, we are unable to provide a free trial at this time, however, we will provide a refund if you are not satisfied with our service within the first 15 days.

**Setup Time?**

Setup is usually within 12 hours of the order, as we do fraud checks manually. Please open a ticket if it has exceeded 12 hours on a Business Day, and we will be happy to investigate and set you up as soon as possible.

**Filtering POP Locations?**

We currently have filtering POPs in the following locations:

1. Toronto
2. Montreal
3. Vancouver
4. San Francisco
5. New York
6. Miami
7. London (England)
8. France
9. Germany
10. Finland
11. Brazil
12. Australia
13. Japan
14. Netherlands

**Bandwidth Billing Policy**

Bandwidth is only billed per clean TB used. 

**Minimum Payments**

Our monthly minimum is $10 for 1TB of bandwidth, or, 50TB for $50. 

**Additional Bandwidth**

Additional bandwidth can be had for SaaS Pro plans $5/TB.

**Can I request additional locations?**

We are open to adding POP locations when there is high-enough demand. Please open a ticket or comment below to request a location, if said location is viable we will add it to our network for the benefit of all our users.

**Support**

We currently offer 24x7x365 support via Email, Ticket and Phone for technical support only. Regular sales and support is between 8 AM - 6 PM ET, Monday-Friday & Saturday. On Sunday, between 10 AM - 4 PM ET.

**Office**

We're based in Perth, Ontario. Our office is located at 2896 Rideau Ferry Rd, Unit 203-B, Perth, Ontario, Canada K7H 3C7. Our office is currently closed to the public due to the COVID-19 outbreak.
